services.name: Community Food Pantry
services.description: Weekly distributions of shelf-stable groceries, fresh produce, and emergency meal kits.

services.name: School Lunch Program
services.description: Free and reduced-price lunches for eligible students. Summer meal sites included.

services.name: Medical Clinic — Sliding Scale
services.description: Primary care and referrals with sliding-scale fees and bilingual staff.

services.name: Adult Education Center
services.description: Free classes for GED preparation, ESL, and digital literacy.

services.name: Career Placement Services
services.description: Resume assistance, interview prep, and employer connections.

services.name: Mobile Pantry — Neighborhoods
services.description: Weekly mobile pantry visits, fresh produce and bread.

services.name: Child Support Help Center
services.description: Assistance with child support applications and referrals.

services.name: Youth Tutoring Program
services.description: After-school tutoring and mentoring for K-12 students.

services.name: Senior Meals Program
services.description: Home-delivered and congregate meals for seniors; eligibility assistance available.

services.name: Mental Health Referral Service
services.description: Referrals to counseling, crisis hotlines, and support groups.

services.name: Job Fair & Training
services.description: Monthly job fairs with on-site interviews and training workshops.

services.name: SNAP Enrollment Help
services.description: In-person help with SNAP applications and recertifications.

services.name: Clothing & Essentials Bank
services.description: Free clothing, hygiene kits and household essentials for families in need.

services.name: Domestic Support Services
services.description: Legal advice, mediation, and support referrals for families.

services.name: Nutrition Workshops
services.description: Cooking classes, budgeting for healthy meals, and nutrition education.
